info.description:
All the requests are required to be authorized using an API Key authentication. 
 Adding *x-api-key* in the header with your unique API Key as a value will grant access.
 To get your *x-api-key* [visit documentation](/server-xms/)
info.title: Messaging APIs

tags.name: Inbound Requests
tags.description:
Inbound Request (Webhooks) can be used for:
* Inbound Message Notifications: Use it to get a notification you when you have received a message.
* Message Status Notifications: Monitor the status of sent messages.
Webhook must be implemented by client and should be available on public internet

tags.name: Session Management
tags.description:
Session API can be used:
* to fetch all session messages.
A session usually starts with first messages and stays active for 24 hours by default.

get.description: List of all the configured channelsPass sandbox=true if you want sandbox channels also to be part of list
List of all the configured templatesPass channelId=<channelId> if you want templates approved for specific channels

post.description:
You must configure a callback (Webhook URL) to receive messages.
To deploy a live webhook that can receive webhook events, your code must have the following* HTTPS support* A valid SSL certificate
Contact Information : Use to respond with contact information for incoming message
This API can be used to upload customer details
This API can be used to upload customer event
Inbound Message Notifications: Use it to get a notification when you have received a message.

Use the message API to send text messages, media, documents, and message templates to your customers
You can send messages by making a POST call regardless of message type. The content of the JSON message body differs for each type of message (text, image, etc.).

use this api to fetch list of all messages for sessionId.
you can get _sessionId_ from inbound message body
Assign session to different queue, all the future inbound messages will be sent to this queue

code.notes:
Template Code will be searched in the repository and match will be served.
 code will be ignored in case template.id is provided

data.description:
Data will be used to resolve placeholders in template, in case of missing value blank will be attempted, 
 Kindly note Template may be rejected in case it does not match the approved format

id.notes: Explicit template.id to be used for message

lang.notes:
Language is an optional param which fallback to en, in all the scenarios of missing params/template
 lang will ignored when template.id is provided

profileId.description: Unique Id assigned to Contact by Core Business Application

mobile.description: Mobile Number if to be changed

profileId.description: Unique Id assigned to Contact by Core Business Application

name.description: Display LabelType, Labels with same name will be grouped together, if not provided key will be used instead

contactId.description: Unique Id assigined to user by Service

lane.description: Contact Used by User while sending messageeg your business number or email address

appId.description: Client App Id if webhook is set for an App

id.description: Unique Message Id assigined by Service

messageIdExt.description: Unique Message Id assigined by Channel if any

originalMessage.description: Original Message sent by Channel :  only if modified/error by service

tags.description: Several Tags/Categories Assigned by our ML/NLP program

caption.description: The provided caption for the media.

filename.notes: This will only be present in document media messages.

id.notes: Can be used to delete the media if stored locally on the client.

id.description: Unique Message Id assigined by Service

messageIdExt.description: Unique Message Id assigined by Channel if any

body.notes: Contains the text of the message, which can contain URLs and formatting.

title.example: Failed to send message because you are outside the support window for freeform messages to this user. Please use a valid HSM notification or reconsider.

lane.description: Contact Used by User while sending messageeg your business number or email address

contactId.description: Contact Id is unique id for any contact, you will recieve it in Inbound.contact

name.description: Name of to be used will, override the name in message

channelId.description: The ID that identifies the channel over which the message should be sent.

to.description: Either a channel-specific identifier for the receiver (e.g. MSISDN for SMS or WhatsApp channels), or email.

caption.notes:
Describes the specified document, image, or video media.

 Do not use with audio or sticker media.

filename.notes:
Describes the specified document, image, or video media.
Describes the filename for the specific document. Use only with document media.

link.notes:
Required when type is audio, document, image, sticker, or video and you are not using an uploaded media ID.
 The protocol and URL of the media to be sent. Use only with HTTP/HTTPS URLs.


 Do not use this field when message type is set to text.

body.notes: Contains the text of the message, which can contain URLs and formatting.

queue.description: Next queue where session should be routed

url.description: The webhook URL can either be: - the URL from your own application- or the partner
